headline: Entergy (ETR) – Among the Best Performing Utility Stocks in 2025
summary: Entergy Corporation (NYSE:ETR) is included among the 10 Best Performing Utility Stocks in 2025. Entergy Corporation (NYSE:ETR) is an integrated energy company that provides electricity to 3 million utility customers in Arkansas, Louisiana, Mississippi, and Texas. Entergy Corporation (NYSE:ETR) received a boost on January 9 when TD Cowen analyst Shelby Tucker initiated coverage of the stock […]
